creator: mcosta@siverion.com
text:
We are running

Apache 1.3.27 statically compiled with:

mod_perl version: mod_perl/1.27
mod_ssl version: 2.8.14 
Linux:Red Hat Enterprise Linux ES 2.1 
Open ssl version:0.9.7

We ran into a problem where the server inflated the following log files

ssl_enginer_log
and 
error_log

with the following error message.
[Wed Oct 22 12:54:25 2003] [error] System: Permission denied (errno: 13)
[Wed Oct 22 12:54:25 2003] [error] mod_ssl: Child could not open SSLMutex
lockfile /usr/local/sivision/enablers/apache/logs/
ssl_mutex.21854 (System error follows)

The server generated these logs until the disk space on our system was
completely exhausted.

Please help!.

Malory

creator: trawick@apache.org
text:
mod_ssl for Apache 1.3 is not developed/supported here... please refer to the
resources at www.modssl.org
